name: V_EHI_PAX_PB_ACCT_TX
description: This view filters out premium billing transaction data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing account transaction.

columns.name: TX_AMT
columns.description: Amount of the premium billing account transaction.

columns.name: PREV_BAL
columns.description: Indicates the previous balance for the premium billing account before the transaction.

columns.name: NEW_BAL
columns.description: Indicates the new balance for the premium billing account after the transaction.

columns.name: OUTSTND_AMT
columns.description: Specifies the outstanding amount for the transaction.

columns.name: DIST_AMT
columns.description: Total distributed amount for the transaction.

columns.name: UNDIST_AMT
columns.description: Total undistributed amount for the transaction.
